commentBody: Like in every aspect of life these disgusting taunts are aimed at female sports writers out of years of teachings by father's and brothers and friends. It's natural for them because it's a usual occurrence in their social circles. It's based in fear and ignorance. In many cases even mothers of these men believe it. I am a jock at heart with a great love of sports. I have family members who express the same kind of resentment over women and football, baseball, or basketball participation or knowledge. I wondered when  Obama and Hillary were running in the primaries in 2008, whether this country was more chauvinistic or racist, at the core. I got my answer.
